code: import{isArray}from'lodash';import rpc from'rage-rpc';class RPC{register(name,callback){rpc.register(name,data=>{return isArray(data)?callback(...data):callback(data);});}unregister(name){rpc.unregister(name);}async callServer(name,args){const response=await rpc.callServer(name,args);return(response===null||response===void 0?void 0:response.err)?Promise.reject(response.err):response;}async callClient(name,args){const response=await rpc.callClient(name,args);return(response===null||response===void 0?void 0:response.err)?Promise.reject(response.err):response;}}export default new RPC();
